intro: Basananthe polygaloides, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its velvety, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of showy, tubular flowers. Its ornamental value makes it a popular houseplant worldwide.
